title: Gallo must be a special kind of... something....

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
A-

Like I can understand if its not an S, the farm is pretty terrible.
But not even an A... 
For a tank? 
Wtf kind scores people are getting on this guy, 1 day after release?

wow
scary stuff

O_o


______

On a positive note, new galio is fun and interesting! Gj update team!
I miss the voice of old gallo tho :( 
_(the new one sounds like he's going to take my wallet as soon as i leave the bar.)_
and ill miss his old W.
But he's pretty cool. :)
and its kinda nice when you listen to people bad-mouth you about just playing the new champ cos its new, and then just flash your mastery xD

replies.body:
> and its kinda nice when you listen to people bad-mouth you about just playing the new champ cos its new, and then just flash your mastery xD

ikr feels good man
